sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Product Performance default">93e3bed97763011061b80bbc3c5a991e</macroponent><name>stylized_text_240_css</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var val = '';
    var target = '';
    var KPI_bds_list = api.data.verticalD_headlinemetric2v.output.result;
    var dropdown_selection = api.state.tab3PortfolioElement;

    for(let i = 0; i < KPI_bds_list.length; i++) {
        var KPI_bd_sysid = KPI_bds_list[i].element.value;
        if (dropdown_selection === KPI_bd_sysid) {
          var KPI_bd_score = KPI_bds_list[i].scores[0].value;
          break;
        }
      }


    val = KPI_bd_score;

    if (val > 20) {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:#008000}';
    } else if (val >= 10 && val < 20) {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:#FFA500}';
    } else {
        return '* { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 600; color:#FF0000}';
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-24 13:56:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>75eed3df7723011061b80bbc3c5a9945</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_240_css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CIO Dashboard" source="sn_ciodashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_75eed3df7723011061b80bbc3c5a9945</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-22 13:53:30</sys_updated_on><target/><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script><sys_claim action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><claim_owner_scope display_value="CIO Dashboard">9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</claim_owner_scope><claim_timestamp>00000000</claim_timestamp><metadata_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_75eed3df7723011061b80bbc3c5a9945</metadata_update_name><previous_claim_app_version>1.0.2</previous_claim_app_version><previous_claim_name>CIO Dashboard</previous_claim_name><previous_claim_scope>9f21ea597723011061b80bbc3c5a9931</previous_claim_scope><sys_created_by>VelentL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-18 12:42:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>b20e69f51bb735d4dba1c3e5464bcbfc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>VelentL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-18 12:42:09</sys_updated_on></sys_claim></record_update>
